name: Кукуево / Kukuevo
description:
Game Kukuevo in the genre of "visual novel", created by a team of 2 people. An exciting story with a choice of plot.

An ordinary office clerk named Dima flies out of work one terrible (for him) day. Having come up with nothing better, our protagonist decides to run away from the routine to the village, where he used to visit his grandmother as a child.



The main action of the game takes place in the village of Kukuyevo, which looks no different from thousands of other villages, but this is only at first glance... Mysticism, riddles, mysterious creatures, friends, first love, all this awaits you in the village of Kukuyevo ".
